Case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB Document 57 Filed 09/26/19 Page 1 of 2

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK

UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

v.

JEFFREY EPSTEIN,
Defendant.

ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG
BY: GLORIA ALLRED
[Jane Doe appearing on Page 76 Line 20 through Page 78 Line 20 in the official transcript of the August 27, 2019 Victim Impact Statement hearing]

19 CR 490 (RMB)
Before Hon. Richard M. Berman
NOTICE OF WITHDRAWAL OF GLORIA ALLRED AND ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG OF REPRESENTATION OF THE SECOND OF THREE JANE DOES WHOSE VICTIM STATEMENTS WERE READ BY GLORIA ALLRED ON AUGUST 27, 2019

NOTICE OF WITHDRAWAL OF GLORIA ALLRED AND ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG OF REPRESENTATION OF THE SECOND OF FOUR JANE DOES WHOSE VICTIM STATEMENTS WERE READ ON AUGUST 27, 2019
September 25, 2019
DOJ-OGR-00000729

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, v. JEFFREY EPSTEIN, Defendant.
ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG BY: GLORIA ALLRED
[Jane Doe appearing on Page 76 Line 20 through Page 78 Line 20 in the official transcript of the August 27, 2019 Victim Impact Statement hearing]

19 CR 490 (RMB) Before Hon. Richard M. Berman NOTICE OF WITHDRAWAL OF GLORIA ALLRED AND ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG OF REPRESENTATION OF THE SECOND OF THREE JANE DOES WHOSE VICTIM STATEMENTS WERE READ BY GLORIA ALLRED ON AUGUST 27, 2019
NOTICE OF WITHDRAWAL OF GLORIA ALLRED AND ALLRED, MAROKO & GOLDBERG OF REPRESENTATION OF THE SECOND OF FOUR JANE DOES WHOSE VICTIM STATEMENTS WERE READ ON AUGUST 27, 2019 September 25, 2019

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the case against Jeffrey Epstein. It is a notice of withdrawal of representation by Gloria Allred and her law firm for one of the victims. The document is typed and does not contain any handwritten text or stamps.
